long_description: The OnGuard Terrier Combination 4 cable lock provides light security for bicycles, helmets and more, and has a convenient, glove-friendly resettable combination lock. 4 ft. long, 6mm thick cable is made of twisted steel to offer good cut resistance and is self-coiling for convenience; vinyl coating helps protect finishes. Integrated, resettable 4-digit combination lock has 10,000 possible variations; lock is permanently forged to the cable for added security. Includes rip-and-stick strap to help keep cable orderly and secure. OnGuard rates the Terrier Combination 4 cable lock as a 20 out of 100 on their 100-point security rating system, where higher-rated locks offer increased security.
short_description: The OnGuard Terrier Combination 4 cable lock provides light security for bicycles, helmets and more, and has a convenient, glove-friendly resettable combination lock.
